price: 43. Ntango bampasi na biso eyelaki bango, тропа nini balombaki ngolu na biso te! Mitema na bango mikomaki makasi mpe satana abongisela bango maye bazalaki kosala.
arabic: فَلَوۡلَآ إِذۡ جَآءَهُم بَأۡسُنَا تَضَرَّعُواْ وَلَٰكِن قَسَتۡ قُلُوبُهُمۡ وَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: falawlā idh jāahum basunā taḍarraʿū walākin qasat qulūbuhum wazayyana lahumu al-shayṭānu mā kānū yaʿmalūna
